title: 1904 Challenge Cup
text:
The 1903–04 Challenge Cup was the 8th staging of <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a>'s oldest knockout competition, the <a href="Challenge%20Cup">Challenge Cup</a>.
Halifax became the second team to record back-to-back Cup wins but would not reach another final until 1921, nor win the Cup again until 1931.
Final.
The final was contested by the <a href="Halifax%20R.L.F.C.">Halifax</a> and <a href="Warrington%20Wolves">Warrington</a> clubs at <a href="The%20Willows%2C%20Salford">the Willows</a> in <a href="Salford%2C%20Greater%20Manchester">Salford</a> on Saturday 30 April 1904, in front of a crowd of 17,041. Halifax retained their title beating Warrington 8–3.
